edu.ncsu.csc216.howlondemand.model

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.howlondemand.model.Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for a Station that can be instantiated from a StationXML object. A Station stores a collection of AudioTrack objects (which are created from the StationXML's AudioTrackXML collection) as well as basic information such as id, title and color. The station also keeps track of the index of the current track being streamed, as well as the current shuffle and repeat toggle status.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

      • Station

        public Station(int id,
               java.lang.String title,
               int color)
        Constructs a Station from scratch with an empty track list; also initializes shuffle and repeat to off.
        Parameters:
        id - the Station's ID number
        title - the Station's title
        color - a number corresponding to the Station's color theme

      • Station

        public Station(edu.ncsu.csc216.audioxml.xml.StationXML s)
        throws edu.ncsu.csc216.audioxml.xml.MalformedTrackException
        Constructs a Station object using data from a StationXML object. Data used include ID number, title, color, shuffle status, repeat status, and any AudioTrackXML objects (creates AudioTrack objects from them)
        Parameters:
        s - the StationXML object used to create a Station object
        Throws:
        edu.ncsu.csc216.audioxml.xml.MalformedTrackException - if the StationXML contains corrupt or improperly formatted AudioTrack data

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the station back to its initial state i.e. the current track index is set back to 0 and shuffle and repeat are both set back to false.
